title: Should a Park Include a Burial Ground? Residents of Newburgh, N.Y., Canâ€™t Agree.
description: Tensions have been simmering over plans for a new addition to a beloved Olmsted park: A memorial for African Americans whose nearby burial ground was taken over by municipal projects.

media:description: In Newburgh, N.Y., there are plans for some new additions to Downing Park.
